Class SQLUpdate

org.klojang.jdbc.SQLUpdate
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public final class SQLUpdate extends SQLStatement<SQLUpdate>
Facilitates the execution of SQL UPDATE and DELETE statements.
